definition: head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
Minister of Education/Director of Education Department

sentences.english: The Premier deputed the Foreign Minister to act as his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 总理委派外交部长作为他的代表。

sentences.english: The intelligence service conceived a grand design to assassinate the War Minister.
sentences.chinese: 情报机构策划了一项暗杀陆军部长的重大计划。

sentences.english: She was the soprano part leader in the University Choir, HKUSTSU.
sentences.chinese: 林氏曾为香港科技大学学生会合唱团女高音声部部长。

sentences.english: Males also sported two horns growing from the top of their skulls.
sentences.chinese: 男性查格里亚人还拥有两只从其头部长出的角。

sentences.english: Journalists are studying the minister's speech for pointers to the contents of next month's policy statement.
sentences.chinese: 记者们在研究部长讲话以揣摩下月施政报告中的动向。

sentences.english: Wan replaces the outgoing science minister, Xu Guanhua, who is retiring.
sentences.chinese: 万钢的前任徐冠华部长已经到了退休年龄。

sentences.english: In theory, Whitehall officials and ministers back in London oversaw the empire.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上说，伦敦白厅官员与部长们监视帝国运作。

sentences.english: The opening ceremony was moderated by Du Qinglin, Minister of Agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 开幕式由农业部部长杜青林主持。

sentences.english: Did you mean Narendra Modi, Gujarat Chief Minister?
sentences.chinese: 您说到吉拉特邦首席部长，纳伦德拉莫迪？

sentences.english: But there was another layer, designed for the people in the ministries.
sentences.chinese: 但演说还有另一层面，是说给部长和大臣们听的。

sentences.english: He will deputize for the foreign minister.
Without a good minister we feel as if we aremissing our hands.
sentences.chinese: 没有一个好部长，我们就觉得好像失去了左膀右臂。

sentences.english: It's just not a good feeling, I want self-confidence, Lim said.
sentences.chinese: 我不同意你的说法林良实是一个好部长。

sentences.english: Former minister of Ministry of Water Resources Zhang Zhenhuai praises the school as "the cradle of Yellow River technical leaders".
sentences.chinese: 水利部原部长杨振怀赞誉学院为“黄河技干摇篮”。

sentences.english: The South Korean Foreign Minister Kim Sung-hwan also said that he suspected that there were additional nuclear facilities in North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 韩国外交部长金星焕也怀疑朝鲜还有另外的核设施。

sentences.english: Health Minister Chen Zhu, to the General Assembly sent a congratulatory message.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部部长陈竺向大会发来了贺信。

definition: head of provincial PRC government department
secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
